markdown:
In this club, the membership structure is diverse, with categories like Foundation, Golfing Senior, Social, and Social Former Foundation Members. New members need to pay an initiation fee, which can vary based on the category. The initiation fee for a Foundation (Legacy) Membership is typically 100% of the current fee [Doc:1#Chunk:1]. Memberships become active upon payment receipt, and new members must attend an orientation within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

I. MEMBERSHIP CATEGORIES & INITIATION FEES
- Foundation (Legacy) Membership:
  - Initiation Fee: 100% of the current fee [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Golfing Senior Membership:
  - Initiation Fee: Not specified
- Social Membership:
  - Initiation Fee: Not specified
- Social Former Foundation Membership:
  - Initiation Fee: Not specified

II. TRANSFER FEES & SCENARIOS
- Foundation Transfer to a Child:
  - Transfer Fee: Equal to the initiation fee for Foundation Membership [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- Transfer to Surviving Spouse Upon Death of Member:
  - Surviving spouses of specific members can request transfer to surviving spouse status [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

III. REINSTATEMENT PROVISIONS
- No specific information provided in the source notes.

IV. PAYMENT & BILLING REQUIREMENTS
- Membership activation upon payment receipt [Doc:1#Chunk:1]
- New members must attend an orientation within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1]

V. AGE-BASED PROVISIONS & RESTRICTIONS
- No specific age requirements mentioned in the source notes.

VI. SPECIAL PROGRAMS & PROVISIONS
- No detailed information provided in the source notes.

VII. ADDITIONAL FEES & REQUIREMENTS
- No additional fees or requirements specified in the source notes.
